translation.en: [reporter] Her name, Nyad, translates in Greek to "water nymph."
translation.zh: 她姓“耐德” 希腊语的意思是水中仙子“宁芙”

translation.en: Twenty-eight year-old Diana Nyad,
translation.zh: 28岁的戴安娜·耐德正在水中前进

translation.en: swimming to conquer yet another body of water.
translation.zh: 28岁的戴安娜·耐德正在水中前进 目标是征服又一片海域

translation.en: [reporter 2] World champion marathon swimmer,
Phi Beta Kappa winner, linguist, author.

translation.en: She swum 32 miles across lake Ontario.

translation.en: [reporter 4] She swam around Manhattan Island,
making the 28-mile trip in record time.
[reporter 5] The question from the millions who go out of their way to avoid swimming in Manhattan waters is why?

translation.en: She says it's a complex matter, involving her deepest emotions.

translation.en: took 27 hours and 38 minutes to complete the swim,
and that is a new open ocean record.

translation.en: Would you welcome Diana Nyad.
-[audience applauding] -[show music playing]
Congratulations.
Are you getting tired of being congratulated on that remarkable,

translation.en: and it was a remarkable achievement? No, I'm not getting tired. It was worth it.

translation.en: -[Carson] Yeah-- -Glad to meet you, by the way.

-And it's outrageous, and it's… -[Carson] Two and a half days?
[Diana] …it's overly ambitious, but I think I can make it.

translation.en: And that's my last swim.
Sixty hours nonstop in the open sea.

translation.en: It's like winning that gold medal in the Olympic Games.

translation.en: I mean, I don't think anybody knows at this point if it can be done.

translation.en: But from the beginning,

translation.zh: 拜托 你不想全身心参与进来吗？

translation.en: your soul ignited by a purpose, a mission?
translation.zh: 让远大的目标和使命点燃你的灵魂

translation.en: It would be an amazing ride.
Think about it, you and me, a great adventure.
translation.zh: 考虑一下 咱们俩一起去拼搏

translation.en: You were born to coach.
translation.zh: 你天生就是当教练的料

translation.en: And a coach needs an athlete.
No, no, no! Serve.
translation.zh: 不行 不行 你发球吧

translation.en: Okay.
Well, I'm doing a test swim down in Mexico.
translation.zh: 我会南下墨西哥做一次试游

translation.en: Come. Let me show you what I got.
translation.zh: 来嘛 让你看看我的本事

translation.en: Eight hours of serious currents in the open ocean.
translation.zh: 在开放海域激烈水流中游八小时

translation.en: Diana, enough. Zip it and serve.
translation.zh: 戴安娜 够了 别说了 发球吧

translation.en: You'd get a great tan.
translation.zh: 你也能把皮肤晒得黝黑

translation.en: I can't believe you gotta put this on every single time.
translation.zh: 你居然每次都要擦这个

translation.en: You know, I feel like I forgot something.
translation.zh: 我觉得我好像忘记了什么事

translation.en: I… I put the Milk-Bones out for the dog, but Gus is gonna--
translation.zh: 我把狗粮给了遛狗人 但是盖斯会…

translation.en: [Diana] Bonnie, Bonnie, need your undivided attention, okay?
translation.zh: 邦妮 我需要你全神贯注 好吗？

translation.en: I wanna be 30 feet from the boat
translation.zh: 我要与船保持9米远的距离

translation.en: with you drafting to my left so I can see you when I breathe.
translation.zh: 你在我的左边这样我呼吸的时候就能看见你

translation.en: -Copy that. -Okay?
-How you feeling? Feeling okay? -No, I… I… I feel… I feel terrific.
translation.zh: -你感觉怎么样？还好吗？-没事 我感觉特别好

translation.en: Like I said five minutes ago. [exhaling]
All right.
-[Diana] One, two, three, four. -[contemplative music playing]
translation.zh: 一 二 三 四

translation.en: [Diana] One, two, three…
translation.zh: 一 二 三 四

translation.en: [Bonnie] Diana, big long strokes!
translation.zh: 戴安娜 大幅度划水！

translation.en: Reach, reach, reach!
All the intellectualizations that we learn to get by with during life
translation.zh: 我们学到的一切用于生存的理性都没用了

translation.en: don't count anymore, and it's a very dreamlike state.
translation.zh: 我们学到的一切用于生存的理性都没用了 这是一种梦一般的状态

translation.en: -[reporter] What do you think about? -[Diana] Uh, I have a system of counting.
translation.zh: 你对此有何想法？ 我有一个计数方法

translation.en: [man] You are worthless! I've already forgotten about you!
translation.zh: 你们一点用都没有！我已经把你们给忘记了！

translation.en: All of you!
You women! I'm done!
translation.zh: 你们这帮女人！我受够了！

translation.en: [Diana] I'm feeling that I'm as powerful as that ocean.
translation.zh: 我觉得自己与海洋一样强大

translation.en: I'm 30 feet wide, with incredible strength and shoulders.
translation.zh: 我9米宽 有强大的力量和肩膀

translation.en: Nothing's gonna stop me to get to the other side.
translation.zh: 没有什么能阻止我抵达彼岸

translation.en: [reporter] Diana Nyad's been packaged as the invincible marathon swimmer.
translation.zh: 戴安娜·耐德是战无不胜的马拉松游泳选手

translation.en: After a year of training,
she is in Havana ready to swim the 103 miles
translation.zh: 她已经来到哈瓦那准备从古巴游到佛罗里达礁岛群

translation.en: from Cuba to the Florida Keys.
translation.zh: 她已经来到哈瓦那准备从古巴游到佛罗里达礁岛群 全程166公里

translation.en: Nyad and her sponsors have spent about $150,000.
translation.zh: 耐德及其赞助人已经花费约15万美元

translation.en: [reporter 2] 40 by 22-foot long, 10-ton steel cage.
translation.zh: 12米长、7米宽重达10吨的钢制笼子

translation.en: This is designed to protect Diana Nyad
translation.zh: 专门用于保护戴安娜·耐德

translation.en: from the sharks and Portuguese men of war
translation.zh: 免受鲨鱼和僧帽水母的攻击

translation.en: which will be making the swim alongside her.
translation.zh: 游泳过程中 笼子将伴随着她

translation.en: [reporter 3] Diana Nyad will swim approximately a quarter of a million strokes.
translation.zh: 戴安娜·耐德将划水大约25万次

translation.en: She'll lose about 20 pounds doing it,
translation.zh: 在此过程中将损失9公斤体重

translation.en: and everyone expects her to be hospitalized from exhaustion and exposure.
translation.zh: 各方预计她将因极度疲惫及在水中时间过长而入院治疗

translation.en: [Diana] If there was ever anyone who could do it, it's now and it's me.
translation.zh: 如果有人能做到 那一定是现在的我

translation.en: This swim is much, much closer to impossible than it is to possible.
translation.zh: 这项挑战几乎是不可能完成的任务

translation.en: [Diana] It's too cold. I can't.
I just don't think I can generate enough heat.
translation.zh: 我恐怕没办法产生足够热量

translation.en: I don't know. What were you thinking? You pathetic, stupid--
translation.zh: 我也说不好 你之前在想什么啊？你又傻又可怜…

translation.en: -[Bonnie] Hey, hey! No. No, no, no, no! -Stupid, stupid!
None of that, none of that.
Don't beat yourself up. You're doing great.
translation.zh: 别自责 你做得很好

translation.en: Too cold.
I can't.
-[Diana shuddering] -Hold on, hold on. Let me get you a towel.
translation.zh: 坚持住 我给你一条毛巾

translation.en: Okay, okay.
I'm supposed to last 60 hours out there.
I can only do six.
What? How long did I make it?
Four hours and fourteen minutes.
Let me ask you, could there be another dream?
translation.zh: 我问你啊 能不能换一个梦想？

translation.en: Why… why would you say that to me?
I talked to Steve Munatones, you know, the open water swimming guy--
translation.zh: 我和史蒂夫·穆纳托内斯聊过 开放水域游泳的那个男的…

translation.en: -Yes. I know who he is, Bonnie! -[Bonnie] Okay. All right.
translation.zh: 嗯 我知道他是谁 邦妮！

translation.en: Well, he doesn't think you can do it,
and he put me in touch with a doctor,
translation.zh: 他介绍我认识了一个医生

translation.en: uh, you know, big sports medicine guy, and he doesn't think you can do it either.
translation.zh: 运动医药大咖 他也觉得你完不成

translation.en: What exactly did they say?
Well, they've been studying athletes, you know, for a long time,
translation.zh: 他们研究运动员很久了

translation.en: and, um, they don't believe that Cuba to Florida is humanly possible.
translation.zh: 他们认为人类不可能从古巴游到佛罗里达

translation.en: I mean, especially not for a woman, especially not for someone your age.
translation.zh: 尤其是女性 而且还是你这个年纪

translation.en: Yeah, well fuck that.
Let me try again tomorrow.
-You need recovery time. -No. Just one more time, okay?
translation.zh: -你需要时间恢复-就再试一次 好吗？

translation.en: Let me show you.
All right.
[Bonnie] Good job, Diana!
[Bonnie] Good job!
[man] Come on, you can do this!
[man exclaiming] Push it, Nyad!
Home stretch, home stretch!
-You can do this. Come on, Nyad, come on! -[girls cheering]
translation.zh: 你行的 加油 耐德 加油！

translation.en: Give me everything you've got! Everything you've got!
Go! Let's go!
-Thirty-two-five-four. It's a record! -Yes!
Eight hours and three minutes. Yes!
[Diana] When you told me that thing,
what that Steve and that so-called doctor said
translation.zh: 什么史蒂夫还有什么所谓医生说的话

translation.en: Really?
-Oh my God! -No.
-You sneaky little-- -[Bonnie chuckling]
Now, that's why you're gonna be a terrific coach.
translation.zh: 所以你才会是一个出色的教练

translation.en: I don't know the first thing about training a swimmer.
translation.zh: 我对游泳训练根本一窍不通

translation.en: You don't need to. You'll learn.
I don't know.
The whole… the whole Cuba thing,
with the visas and the logistics and the money.
translation.zh: 签证、后勤、资金等各方面

translation.en: I mean, it… it… uh, there's sharks out there.
-I'll handle all of it. -[Bonnie laughing]
What about my clients?
-Oh, I don't know. -[Bonnie] What about them?
They'll survive!
Oh… You just gonna quit your sportscasting job? Yes!
translation.zh: -你要把体育播报的工作辞掉？-对！

translation.en: Come on! No more sitting on the sidelines. I've had it.
translation.zh: 不能再坐在边上看了 我受够了

translation.en: Listen, Bonnie, I just know I can do it, okay?
translation.zh: 听我说 邦妮我知道我能完成 好吗？

translation.en: And I wanna do it with you.
translation.zh: 而且我要和你一起去做

translation.en: I gotta do it with you. I couldn't do it without you.
translation.zh: 一定得和你一起 没有你 我完成不了

translation.en: All right. Okay, I'm in.
All right!
Yes!
-[Bonnie] Yes! -Yes!
That's it.
You're at 52.
Fifty-two.
Good job.
That's it.
Keep going.
[Diana] I'm dealing with a swim in the open seawater.
It'd be like fighting a heavyweight bout for two and a half days.
translation.zh: 就像打重量级拳击赛但时长是两天半

translation.en: I feel like a panther myself. I feel like I'm very well trained.
translation.zh: 我觉得自己就像一只黑豹我觉得我训练得很好

translation.en: No days off, to get myself in incredible muscular and cardiovascular shape.
translation.zh: 不能休息要让我的肌肉和心血管达到巅峰状态

translation.en: Expending so many calories.
I eat anywhere from 3,000 to 4,000 calories every three hours.
translation.zh: 我每三个小时摄入三、四千卡的能量

translation.en: The physical strength and obviously, the mental courage are…
translation.zh: 身体力量和精神勇气都…

translation.en: [reporter] If the seas remain calm,
she'll still have to brave sharks and exhaustion
translation.zh: 她还是得在水中勇敢面对鲨鱼与疲惫的威胁

translation.en: during her two and a half days in the water.
[Diana] Just outside Australia, they have the largest
translation.zh: 澳大利亚附近海域 有全世界古巴以外最大的食人远洋鲨

translation.en: man-eating pelagic sharks in the world off Cuba,
translation.zh: 有全世界古巴以外最大的食人远洋鲨

translation.en: and I don't take them lightly at all.
In Bhiwani, we saw a 14-foot shark.
translation.zh: 在比米尼我们见过一条四米多的鲨鱼

translation.en: Hey, how long she gonna be?
Uh, 8 hours and 31 minutes.
It's a new fan.
I think it's time we get outta Dodge.
translation.zh: 我觉得咱们是该出发了

translation.en: I hate to interrupt your conversation,
but, um, I… I just need an answer from you.
Did you contact that guy about the steel cage?
translation.zh: 你有没有联系负责钢笼那个人？

translation.en: Oh. Oh yeah.
No, I'm not doing that again.
Excuse me?
Well, a shark cage makes it an aided swim.
translation.zh: 用了防鲨笼就是辅助游泳

translation.en: No, thanks.
It's just me and the ocean the whole way.
Well, when were you gonna tell me that?
translation.zh: 你原本打算什么时候告诉我？

translation.en: Yeah, I don't want an asterisk next to my life's greatest achievement.
translation.zh: 我不希望我一生最伟大的成就旁边有一个星号

translation.en: -But you know it's never been done before. -Exactly.
translation.zh: -但你知道以前从没这样做过 对吧？-就是啊

translation.en: I'll be the first.
I'm the swimmer, Bon. It's my call.
translation.zh: 是我游 邦妮 我来决定

translation.en: -Hello? -[woman] Come in, come inside.
-[woman exclaiming] -Hello.
-Oh my gosh. -Anna!
-I'm so excited to have you. -Thank you.
-Bonnie, yes? -Bonnie.
-Hello, I'm Diana. -She's dying to meet you.
translation.zh: -你好 我是戴安娜-她特别想见你

translation.en: -Here, I take. -Oh, that's okay, I got it, I got it.
translation.zh: -我来拿吧-没事 我自己拿

translation.en: You know, I haven't seen Nina in years,
translation.zh: 我好多年没和妮娜见面了

translation.en: but, uh, she and my mom still talk every week,
translation.zh: 不过她和我妈每周都联系

translation.en: and we always hear about you.
translation.zh: 我们总会听到她提起你

translation.en: -[woman] Mm-hmm. -We're so grateful.
-Thank you so much. -Yeah.
-Our home is yours. -Our pleasure.
translation.zh: -就当在自己家里-这是我们的荣幸

translation.en: [in French] Isn't it, Mia?
The English Channel, for example, is 21 miles.
translation.zh: 比如英吉利海峡宽34公里

translation.en: I could swim that in seven and a half hours,
translation.zh: 我可以在7个半小时内游完

translation.en: even in the cold.
translation.zh: 即便在寒冷的情况下也可以

translation.en: Cuba is on another level.
It's 100 miles, or 60 hours, of constant swimming.
Now, I can stop to get medical attention,
translation.zh: 我可以停下接受医疗救治

translation.en: I receive nourishment from my handlers,
translation.zh: 可以从教练处获得食物补充

translation.en: or just float and marvel at the dazzling universe above.
translation.zh: 或者漂浮着欣赏上方令人惊叹的宇宙

translation.en: It's just so cool.
I'm this tiny speck floating under the stars,
translation.zh: 我是星辰下漂浮着的一个小点

translation.en: but I can't stop or touch the boat,
translation.zh: 但我不能停下或触碰船只

translation.en: even to poop or pee.
translation.zh: 哪怕是为了拉屎或撒尿都不行

translation.en: -Do you poop in the water? -[kids giggling]
-Yes. I'll get back to that. -[boy] Eww.
translation.zh: 对 我回头会说这个问题

translation.en: [Diana] But first, I should tell you about the cold,
translation.zh: 首先我应该跟你们说一下寒冷的问题

translation.en: the risk for hypothermia, but that's not what I'm most afraid of.
translation.zh: 体温过低的风险 但这不是我最害怕的

translation.en: What are you most afraid of?
Sea creatures.
In these very waters, live some of the deadliest marine animals on Earth.
translation.zh: 这片水域生活着地球上一些最致命的动物

translation.en: Forty-nine varieties of sharks,
stingrays, man of war.
And at night, you don't even know they're there.
translation.zh: 夜里根本发现不了他们

translation.en: It's so dark you can barely see a few inches in front of your face,
translation.zh: 非常暗 在你面前几厘米都看不清

translation.en: and they're right out there just waiting for us.
translation.zh: 它们就在海里等着我们

translation.en: Yes?
Here I am, 30 years later,
and I would love to see Pizza Hut emblazoned on my swimsuit
translation.zh: 我很希望看到我的泳衣印上必胜客的字样

translation.en: as I traverse these--
Yes. Your math is correct, I am 61,
translation.zh: 对 你没算错 我今年61岁

translation.en: but that's the reason to do it, not the other--
translation.zh: 但这正是去挑战的理由而不是放弃的…

translation.en: Well, of course you're entitled to your opinion,
translation.zh: 你当然可以有你自己的看法

translation.en: but I can't begin to tell you how incredibly wrong and shortsighted it is.
translation.zh: 但我要告诉你 这样的想法大错特错且极为短视

translation.en: First time, it was like taking candy from a baby.
I just… I strutted into Rocky Aoki's office, the Benihana guy,
translation.zh: 我昂首阔步走进红花铁板烧老板青木广彰的办公室

translation.en: and I heard he was into ocean stuff, so I just showed up,
translation.zh: 我听说他对海洋感兴趣所以我直接去了

translation.en: and I walked out with this huge, like, lottery-sized check for $300,000.
translation.zh: 然后就拿到了彩票大奖一般的30万美元支票

translation.en: -You realize I've heard this story? -[Diana] Yeah.
-Right, like, 400 times. -[Diana] It's a good story.
Yeah, but now it's like a giant-sized lottery check.
translation.zh: 但现在成了一张巨大的彩票支票

translation.en: Think he wants to invest again?
Actually, he's dead.
Also, we need $500,000 this time.
[Bonnie] Well, maybe we need, like, a new angle.
translation.zh: 也许我们需要一个新的角度

translation.en: Less men in suits and more lady stuff.
translation.zh: 少一些穿西装的男人多一些女性产品

translation.en: -What do you mean, like tampons? -[Bonnie chuckling]
translation.zh: 什么意思？比如卫生棉吗？

translation.en: Not that we need those anymore, thank God. No, thank God.
Also, Bon,
not that I'm worried because I'm… I'm not, but
what are we gonna do about the sharks?
-Sharks don't hunt people. Okay? -[rock music playing on radio]
translation.zh: 鲨鱼不会捕杀人类 好吗？

translation.en: They don't wanna eat humans, they wanna eat seals.
translation.zh: 它们不要吃人 而是要吃海豹

translation.en: Yeah, but--
Sometimes, they'll test whether you are in fact a seal.
translation.zh: 它们有时候会测试一下你是不是海豹

translation.en: How exactly do they test you? I mean…
That's why we have the shield.
Two electrodes attached to the back of each kayak
translation.zh: 每艘小艇后部都连接着两个电极

translation.en: that transmit an amplified signal.
They hate it. You watch.
translation.zh: 鲨鱼很讨厌这个 你们看好了

translation.en: Is… is that really necessary?
Don't worry, we've tested it.
translation.zh: 别担心 我们测试过了

translation.en: Tried it on a bloody horse's leg in the South Pacific.
translation.zh: 在南太平洋用一条血淋淋的马腿试的

translation.en: Now, that's a dinner bell for a shark. They all turned away.
translation.zh: 这对鲨鱼来说就是吃饭闹铃 却全部转身离开

translation.en: Do you think you can, like, shine a light on her at night?
translation.zh: 在夜里可以用光照着她吗？

translation.en: 'Cause I can't see her,
and the only way I know where she is is when she's, uh, slapping the water…
translation.zh: 只有在她用水拍水的时候我才知道她在哪里…

translation.en: -Guys! -…with her hands.
-[man] Light attracts bait fish. -Hello?
-[Diana] Guys! -[man] Oh, he's coming in. Watch.
translation.zh: -哎！-噢 鲨鱼来了 看好了

translation.en: Hey! Tiny sensory organs in the snout. The electrical current messes them up.
translation.zh: 电流会干扰吻部微小的感觉器官

translation.en: Me and my divers will be all eyes and ears doing our sweeps,
translation.zh: 我和我的潜水员们会密切做好巡查工作

translation.en: ready if, God forbid, the shield goes down.
translation.zh: 作好准备 以防万一屏障失效

translation.en: I'd… I'd like to know what weapons you use.
translation.zh: 我想知道你们用什么武器

translation.en: Is it like spear guns, or… or--
Poles with tennis balls.
We won't harm 'em.
You know, just a prod on the snout.
So, no weapons.
Look, Diana, we'll protect you, all right?
translation.zh: 听我说 戴安娜我们会保护你 好吗？

translation.en: But you gotta remember,
this is their ocean, okay? You're just passing through.
translation.zh: 这是它们的海洋 好吗？你只是过客

translation.en: Just think of the marketing opportunities with me at the forefront.
translation.zh: 用我的形象来做推广营销效果应该会非常好

translation.en: I don't know, maybe, "Still dry."
translation.zh: 比如广告词可以是“还干着呢”

translation.en: Or just go classic,
me on a billboard with your iconic slogan ribboned beneath me,
translation.zh: 我在广告牌上下面配上你们标志性的广告词

translation.en: "Strong enough for a man, but made for a woman."
translation.zh: “男人都能用 但专为女性设计”

translation.en: Oh, of course.
Yeah. Thanks, Deb.
I think I just scored us a sponsor. [exclaiming]
-Yeah! All right! -[Diana] Whoo!
So I got a lead on a navigator guy.
translation.zh: 领航员方面 我有眉目了

translation.en: -You show me a navigator… -[Bonnie] He's in from Key West. -…that isn't full of shit. -[Bonnie] You can't drive the boat too.
translation.zh: -领航员可不能满嘴胡说八道-他在基韦斯特 你不可能自己开船

translation.en: We need this guy.
Everybody says he's great, they call him the King of the Gulf.
translation.zh: 大家都说他很好 称他为“海湾之王”

translation.en: So, I invited him for lunch tomorrow,
translation.zh: 所以我邀请他明天吃午餐

translation.en: and I'm gonna order you the fish tacos with the salsa on the side,
translation.zh: 我会帮你点鱼肉玉米卷配莎莎酱

translation.en: and you're gonna be your most charming self, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你要展示出最有魅力的一面 好吗？

translation.en: [Diana] Nice boat.
I designed her myself.
I had to re-draw the lines plans, like, 76 times.
My wife thought I was freaking out of my mind, but she's perfect.
translation.zh: 我妻子觉得我疯了 但真的很完美

translation.en: -Your wife or your boat? -Both of 'em.
translation.zh: -你妻子还是你的船？-两者都很完美

translation.en: John Bartlett.
I used to watch you on the Wide World of Sports.
translation.zh: 我以前看你的《世界体育大观》节目

translation.en: Oh yeah?
"Thrill of victory, agony of defeat," and all that shit?
translation.zh: “胜利的激动 失败的痛苦”看这些吗？

translation.en: I need to see your navigation cabin.
translation.zh: 我要看一下你的导航舱室

translation.en: No problemo.
The Gulf Stream's a raging dick.
It's basically a fast-moving river in the middle of the ocean
translation.zh: 就像大洋中央一条快速向东流动的河

translation.en: going east when you wanna go north.
translation.zh: 就像大洋中央一条快速向东流动的河 而你是要向北游

translation.en: -If you're not exceeding its speed-- -You're going backwards.
translation.zh: -如果你不能超过它的速度…-就会不进反退

translation.en: Yes, I know.
You are aware that I've tried this before?
translation.zh: 你知道我以前尝试在这里游过吧？

translation.en: I sure am.
Well, I don't need a primer on the Gulf Stream, okay?
translation.zh: 不需要给我普及墨西哥湾暖流的知识好吗？

translation.en: What I need to know is what qualifies you for this mission.
translation.zh: 我需要知道的是你凭什么能胜任这项任务

translation.en: -What's your pedigree? -Wait… wait a minute. What… what is this?
translation.zh: -你的履历如何？-等一下 这是干什么？

translation.en: Do you think I'm selling you here,
translation.zh: 你觉得我上赶着要为你服务吗？

translation.en: or do you just have a hair across your ass?
My last navigator screwed me, okay?
translation.zh: 我之前的领航员把我害惨了 好吗？

translation.en: He had me slamming into the surf for 14 hours straight.
translation.zh: 他让我连续14个小时往浪涌里游

translation.en: -I would've made it if he hadn't-- -[John] Well, that's on you.
translation.zh: -要不是因为他 我原本可以完成…-这怪你自己

translation.en: I looked him up, your old navigator from '78.
translation.zh: 我查过你1978年用的领航员

translation.en: America's Cup preppy asshole who didn't know shit about the Straits.
translation.zh: 是个美洲杯学院派 对佛罗里达海峡屁都不懂

translation.en: You can have all the pedigree in the world,
but if you haven't sailed here, if you haven't put in your 10,000 hours,
translation.zh: 但如果没在这里航行过如果没投入一万小时

translation.en: these counter-currents, these eddies,
it's like getting a freaking horse trainer to install your dishwasher.
translation.zh: 就像找驯马师来帮你装洗碗机一样

translation.en: -That's poetic. -Step outside with me for a minute.
translation.zh: -你说得很有诗意-跟我出来一下

translation.en: Stick out your tongue.
Stick out your tongue.
[John] You taste that?
-I don't know, salt? -No.
Sand from the Sahara 7,000 miles away.
translation.zh: 不 是一万公里外撒哈拉沙漠的沙

translation.en: That's what this wind'll do.
What you wanna do has never been done, right?
translation.zh: 你想做的事 从来没人完成过 对吧？

translation.en: The course must be exact.
The axis of the stream has to be calculated by someone who knows what the hell they're dealing with
translation.zh: 洋流的轴线必须由懂行的人来计算

translation.en: so the stream will work for you, not against you,
translation.zh: 这样洋流就能为你所用而不是对你不利

translation.en: recomputing every 15 minutes.
You're off a fraction of a degree to the east,
you're headed to the Turks and Caicos, a fraction to the west, Texas,
translation.zh: 就是朝特克斯和凯科斯群岛去 如果向西稍微偏离 就是朝德州去

translation.en: or worse, you're spun into an eddy.
So choose the wrong dude again. No biggie.
translation.zh: 所以你可以再一次选错人没什么大不了

translation.en: It just might cost you your life.
Well, thank you for your interest in the position.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢你对这个职位的兴趣

translation.en: -Bye. -He'll do.
[Bonnie] Hey… hey, wait. Uh, what about lunch?
translation.zh: 哎 等一下 不吃午餐吗？

translation.en: You got a beer?
-[Bonnie] Yeah. -I need a beer.
[Bonnie] If anybody in the world can do it, it's her. Come on.
translation.zh: 全世界如果有谁能完成 那一定是她

translation.en: You must see it, like, a little bit.
translation.zh: 拜托 你一定看到了一点她的实力

translation.en: Otherwise, you wouldn't be sitting here, right?
translation.zh: 否则你不会坐在这里 对吧？

translation.en: You brought me lunch.
[laughing] Correct, I did.
I'll be honest with you, Bonnie. I don't know. I really don't.
translation.zh: 我跟你说实话 邦妮 不好说 真的不好说

translation.en: There's only a few days each year
when the wind direction and the stream will maybe let a swimmer cross.
translation.zh: 风和洋流的方向也许适合横渡

translation.en: Maybe. It's a tiny window.
translation.zh: 也许有可能 时间窗口很短

translation.en: And even then, she may not make it. You know?
translation.zh: 即便踩准了时间 她也可能完不成

translation.en: Plus, your deal is all volunteer, no comp.
translation.zh: 而且你们要求全自愿 没有报酬

translation.en: We train for months and may not even get a green light.
translation.zh: 我们训练几个月甚至不一定能真的能游

translation.en: [sighing] Yeah.
Wanna know my favorite feeling ever?
translation.zh: 知道我最喜欢的感觉是什么吗？

translation.en: When I was… when I was playing racquetball at my peak,
translation.zh: 我当时处于打壁球的巅峰状态

translation.en: and I was 30,
and it was just me and the girls just goofing off all around the country
translation.zh: 我和女孩们在全国到处瞎玩

translation.en: like brats,
you know, and then… then it's… it's game day and you get that rush,
translation.zh: 到了比赛日 就会非常激动

translation.en: like, "I'm gonna win, I'm gonna win," you know?
I mean, the only way that I'm gonna get that magic at this age
translation.zh: 到了现在的年纪还想找回那种神奇的感觉 唯一的方法

translation.en: is through her.
How many more chances are we gonna get to do heart-pumping shit, huh?
translation.zh: 我们还有多少机会能做让人心跳加速的事呢？

translation.en: So that's why you're here.
Yeah, that and she needs me.
translation.zh: 对 这是一方面 另一方面是她需要我

translation.en: Don't ask me why.
And we really need you. I promise you, it won't be boring.
translation.zh: 而且我们真的很需要你 我向你保证 一定不会无聊

translation.en: Some people say boring is underrated.
translation.zh: 有的人认为无聊也不错

translation.en: Wild guess, you're not one of 'em.
-[Bonnie] Yikes. Bad. -[Diana wincing]
[Bonnie] I'm gonna call around, see what people are using.
translation.zh: 我打电话到处问问 看看别人用什么

translation.en: And, uh, you know, we got some good ideas about how to keep you following the boat.
translation.zh: 关于你怎么跟船的问题 我们有许多不错的想法

translation.en: How you feeling? Ready for the overnight?
translation.zh: 你感觉怎么样？准备好通宵了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. [wincing] -Yeah. -Yes, yes. -Well, you look great.
Look, hardening up. How's that shoulder? Still seizing up on you?
translation.zh: 越来越好 肩膀怎么样？还抽筋吗？

translation.en: It's… it's not too bad.
How about… how about your mind?
Like on the long swims?
translation.zh: 这么远距离 头脑上准备好了吗？

translation.en: [Diana] It's good.
I've got my playlist up to about 85 songs.
translation.zh: 我的播放列表加到大概85首歌了

translation.en: Neil Young, Janis Joplin, The Beatles.
translation.zh: 尼尔·杨 詹尼斯·乔普林披头士乐队

translation.en: If I sing "No Reply" 1,000 times in a row, that's 9 hours and 45 minutes to the beat.
translation.zh: 如果我连续唱《没有回应》1000遍 就等于打9小时45分钟的节拍

translation.en: I may need one more song, though,
but it has to be in 4/4 time to go with the stroke.
translation.zh: 必须是四四拍 和划水节奏一致

translation.en: Also, just so you know,
if you find yourself going someplace dark, you know, find yourself beating up on yourself just--
translation.zh: 如果你发现自己情绪低落或自责 就…

translation.en: I said I'm fine.
Let me do that, okay?
All right.
Okay.
[Bonnie] Everybody, all right, listen up.
So, 24-hour training swim.
Uh, this is our lovely Dee, she's our captain.
translation.zh: 这位是我们亲爱的迪伊船长

translation.en: When she's at the helm, nobody talks to her. All right?
translation.zh: 她掌舵的时候谁都不能和她说话 好吗？

translation.en: [whispering] I've never heard that woman speak,
translation.zh: 我从没听过这女人说话

translation.en: but she's the best in the biz.
Same goes for the swimmer. When in the water, no talking to her.
translation.zh: 对游泳选手也是一样在水中时 不能和她说话

translation.en: No joking. Serious business.
translation.zh: 不能开玩笑 这是很严肃的事

translation.en: On our way, let's go. You guys know each other.
Hey, Dee.
Yeah, the red light was Nico's idea.
We can't train a spotlight on you.
translation.zh: 我们不能用聚光灯照你

translation.en: That'd send all kinds of creatures after you.
translation.zh: 会导致各种生物盯上你

translation.en: But they don't like red.
If we can't get something into her gut, her body will start eating itself.
translation.zh: 如果不让她吃东西 她的身体就会自噬

translation.en: So, feedings every 90 minutes, but you never tell her what time it is.
translation.zh: 所以每90分钟喂一次 但绝不能告诉她时间

translation.en: And, uh, you know, try not to… to bump up against the ego.
translation.zh: 还有尽量不要触碰她的自尊心

translation.en: You know, don't yell at her. She does not respond well to tough love.
translation.zh: 不要吼她 她对强硬的爱比较抵触

translation.en: But don't baby her either.
When she starts to hallucinate, you go with it. Okay?
translation.zh: 当她开始产生幻觉时你顺着她 好吗？

translation.en: Okay, let's show her.
translation.zh: 好的 我们让她看看

translation.en: Oh, hey, check it out.
Bartlett made you a lane so you can stay closer to the boat.
translation.zh: 巴特利特给你做了一条泳道 这样你就能不远离船只

translation.en: -You did that? -[John] I did.
[Diana] The mind deteriorates along with the body.
translation.zh: 头脑与身体的状态一起下滑

translation.en: When the body weakens and the hallucinations start,
translation.zh: 当身体变得虚弱并开始出现幻觉时

translation.en: it's like sensory deprivation.
I thought that gulls were dive-bombing my calf
translation.zh: 我以为有许多海鸥在俯冲轰炸我的小腿

translation.en: and I thought there was blood down the front of my face.
I can barely see.
The mental stress that you go through is unbelievable,
just about torture.
I was vomiting and I was losing all my strength and…
translation.zh: 我当时在呕吐 一点力气都没了…

translation.en: [man] Can you read what it says after Nyad?
translation.zh: 读一下“耐德”后面的字 好吗？

translation.en: That is your name, Diana.
translation.zh: 这是你的名字 戴安娜

translation.en: This is your destiny.
[man] So after your turn, I wanna see you increase that stroke rate.
translation.zh: 转身之后 你要加快划水速度

translation.en: Wait, what is that?
-What? Let me see. -[Diana] I was just kidding.
translation.zh: -是什么？让我看看-我开玩笑的

translation.en: Why are you throwing up?
Because… [groaning]
…because I just swam for 24 hours.
Hey, visas came through. We're cleared for Cuba.
translation.zh: 签证来了 我们可以去古巴了

translation.en: -Better? -[Diana] Yeah.
-All right. High-five. -[Diana breathing heavily]
[Sawyer] Finally tonight,
someone who was a kind of hero for so many of us,
translation.zh: 在我们许多人心目中她当年是一个英雄

translation.en: Diana Nyad, the incredible swimmer,
translation.zh: 传奇游泳选手戴安娜·耐德回来了

translation.en: is back and about to embark on something we couldn't believe.
translation.zh: 传奇游泳选手戴安娜·耐德回来了 她即将踏上我们无法相信的征程 （古巴 哈瓦那）

translation.en: [reporter] …set her sights on conquering a feat that has eluded her for 30 years.
translation.zh: …她要征服这萦绕了她30年的未竟壮举

translation.en: [Diana in Spanish] I hope to encourage unity
and good relations between our two countries.
translation.zh: 两国的团结和良好关系

translation.en: A connection.
And I can't wait to set off as soon as the weather allows.
translation.zh: 真希望合适的天气赶快到来

translation.en: Thank you.
[Diana] Uh, you know what?
I-- There's something I wanna say to all of you.
[smacking lips] As we await the signal from Mother Nature,
translation.zh: 在等待大自然信号的同时

translation.en: I signed a contract with my soul to never, ever give up.
translation.zh: 我和我的灵魂订下誓约 永不放弃

translation.en: You've all sacrificed a great deal.
translation.zh: 你们都作出了巨大的牺牲

translation.en: No money, no perks, no guarantees.
translation.zh: 没钱 没好处 没保障

translation.en: But I can think of no worthier cause for such sacrifice.
translation.zh: 但没有比这更值得牺牲的事业了

translation.en: My life's mission, dare I say my destiny,
translation.zh: 我毕生的使命 也可以说是我的宿命

translation.en: to fight the wildly unpredictable conditions,
translation.zh: 与变幻莫测的自然条件作斗争

translation.en: to tangle with the elements.
I will be the first Nyad.
translation.zh: 我将成为排名第一的“耐德”

translation.en: If you look my name up in the dictionary, you will see…
translation.zh: 如果在字典里查我的姓

translation.en: -That's great. -…literally "water nymph."
translation.zh: -戴安娜 好的-会看到“水中仙子‘宁芙’”

translation.en: Thank you so much. And… and… to… to… to destiny.
-To all of us. To Cuba. Okay? -[all] To Cuba.
translation.zh: -敬我们所有人 敬古巴 好吗？-敬古巴

translation.en: -To waiting for the weather. -Yes.
If we don't get out in a couple of weeks, temp drops.
translation.zh: 如果我们不能在几周内出发温度就会下降

translation.en: -A year down the drain. -Yeah.
So, how's it looking?
I… I got three different forecasters, both for weather and the axis of the stream.
translation.zh: 我有三份不同的天气及洋流预报

translation.en: One in Maryland, one in Washington,
translation.zh: 一份马里兰州的 一份华盛顿的

translation.en: one in the Miami Hurricane Center.
translation.zh: 一份迈阿密飓风中心的

translation.en: -I'm… I'm comparing their models. -And?
translation.zh: -我在比对他们的模型-结论呢？

translation.en: And it's Russian Roulette.
We might have a window when this clears. Might.
translation.zh: 这次天气好转之后我们也许有一个时间窗口

translation.en: I'd put our chances at marginal to fair.
translation.zh: 我们的机会在较小到尚可之间

translation.en: [Diana] I gotta get out of here.
Go for a run or something.
[scoffing] Have you looked outside?
Yeah. Well, I have to stay ready.
translation.zh: 嗯 我得时刻准备好

translation.en: [Bonnie] Uh, you are ready.
I bumped into you in the kitchen, it was like walking into a brick wall.
translation.zh: 我之前在厨房遇见你就像撞到一堵墙

translation.en: All right, look, I… I don't want you to burn out,
translation.zh: 听我说 我不希望你把精力都消耗完

translation.en: so just sit still, be patient.
translation.zh: 就好好坐着 耐心一点

translation.en: I know it's hard. It's hard.
No, you actually don't know. You don't have to do it.
translation.zh: 你其实并不知道 你又不用游

translation.en: [scoffing] It's easy for you to say that, right?
[scoffing] Yeah? Cut the shit.
All right? All this "me-me-me-me" crap.
-[Diana] What? -I remortgaged my house for this--
translation.zh: -什么？-为了这事 我把房子办了再抵押

translation.en: Yeah, so did I.
Well, then the correct response would be "thank you."
Oh, so you're just gonna leave?
No, no, go ahead, fine.
Okay. No, go ahead. It's okay. Just go smoke a joint or something.
translation.zh: 去吧 没事 去抽一根大麻烟

translation.en: Why don't you do some yoga? Read a book.
translation.zh: 要不你做做瑜伽吧？或者看一本书

translation.en: I didn't bring a book!
Storm's over.
It's our window.
This is it, Diana. It's go time.
translation.zh: 戴安娜 出发时间到了

translation.en: [reporter] There are 16 million people who do open water swimming.
translation.zh: 有1600万人在开放水域游泳

translation.en: There are 116 people who have actually swum over 24 hours straight.
But to go more than 48 hours,
that's only 12 people in the history of the world.
translation.zh: 在全世界历史上只有12人

translation.en: And of those 12,
Nyad is in a venue with jellyfish, sharks,
translation.zh: 耐德所在的水域有水母、鲨鱼

translation.en: and the largest, fastest moving body of water in the world.
translation.zh: 以及世界上流动最快的水体

translation.en: She needs to go 52 hours plus for Nyad to succeed.
translation.zh: 要取得成功 耐德得游超过52小时

translation.en: Everything has to go perfectly.
Thank you.
All right, guys, she's ready, so move back a little bit, yeah?
translation.zh: 好的 她准备好了 请往后退一点

translation.en: -Okay. -Thank you so much, everyone.
You got this. You're gonna crush it, Diana.
translation.zh: 你行的 你一定能大杀四方 戴安娜

translation.en: -Onward. -Onward.
Courage!
[Diana] Every talk show host and every stranger on a city bus asks me,
translation.zh: 每一个脱口秀主持人公交车上的每一个陌生人都问我

translation.en: "Why does a seemingly sane,
obviously beautiful young woman put herself through this kind of torture?"
translation.zh: “一个看似精神正常美少女 为什么会让自己经受如此折磨？”

translation.en: The whole key to success in marathon swimming,
masochistic as it may seem, is the person who succeeds
is the person who is willing to endure the most pain in the most number of hours.
translation.zh: 就是要愿意在最长的时间里忍受最大的痛苦

translation.en: Bartlett, how's it looking up there?
translation.zh: 巴特利特 天气怎么样？

translation.en: Good.
For now.
[Diana in English] Four hundred sixty-one, four hundred sixty-two,
four hundred sixty-three…
Seven twenty-eight, seven twenty-nine, seven thirty…
[Diana] Seven thirty-two, seven thirty-three,
seven thirty-four, seven thirty-five, seven thirty-six,
Eight hundred seventy-eight, eight hundred seventy-nine, eight hundred…
Four ninety-two, four ninety-three, four ninety-four, four ninety-five…
[Bonnie] Diana!
Come in for a feeding!
[Bonnie] Here you go.
Bonnie, my shoulder.
All right. Scale of one to ten?
translation.zh: 疼痛度从1分到10分打几分？

translation.en: six.
Ugh, jeez. A normal person's eight. All right.
translation.zh: 天呐！普通人的8分 好的

translation.en: -Uh, medic? Need a couple of Tylenol. -[woman] Copy that.
translation.zh: -医生 需要几片泰诺-收到

translation.en: [Bonnie] All right. Well, you've gotta communicate with me.
translation.zh: 好的 你得跟我沟通

translation.en: -Okay. -Don't just fight through it.
Come on, come on.
-Here you go. -[boat engine revving]
Got it?
It's good.
Are you okay?
Swimmer's in.
[Bonnie] Onward.
[John] Oh shit.
[reporter] From the beginning, the ocean was relentless,
translation.zh: 从一开始 海洋就很无情

translation.en: but she kept swimming.
She swallowed seawater.
Seasickness lasted until the 15th hour, depleting her of strength.
translation.zh: 晕船症状一直持续到第15个小时耗尽了她的体力

translation.en: She couldn't keep her food down, but she kept swimming.
translation.zh: 她总是忍不住将食物吐出但她仍继续游着

translation.en: -Bon. -What's happening, Diana?
Are you… are you okay?
I'm okay.
I-- [wincing]
Whoa, whoa, whoa. Diana, Diana, stop. Look at me.
translation.zh: 戴安娜 停 看着我

translation.en: Stop talking.
It's okay.
Shit. All right. She's… she's having an allergic reaction.
translation.zh: 妈的 好的 她出现过敏反应了

translation.en: What did you give her? Angerine. It's like Tylenol.
translation.zh: -你给她吃的什么？-恩特灵 和泰诺差不多

translation.en: [Bonnie] No! We went over this. She's allergic.
translation.zh: 不是吧！我们之前说过的 她过敏！

translation.en: She can't have any kind of NSAID. Shit!
translation.zh: 她不能用任何种类的非类固醇抗炎药 妈的！

translation.en: [reporter] Constantly changing winds forced her navigators in the first hours to change course.
translation.zh: 在开始的几小时中风不断变化 迫使领航员改变航向

translation.en: [reporter 2] She was swimming northeast toward the Florida coast,
translation.zh: 她当时向东北方朝佛罗里达海岸游去

translation.en: directly into that rough water.
[reporter 3] The conditions took three times the energy Diana wanted to expend.
translation.zh: 恶劣的自然条件 令戴安娜的体能消耗增加两倍

translation.en: [reporter 4] After battling relentless weather conditions
translation.zh: 虽然与无情的天气条件作斗争

translation.en: and hopelessly off course,
translation.zh: 但却绝望地偏离了航线

translation.en: Diana was pulled from the water.
It took five minutes to convince her the swim was impossible.
translation.zh: 用了五分钟才说服她此次挑战已不可能完成

translation.en: She kept saying, "What will it take?"
"I know I can go on for at least 30 more hours."
translation.zh: 我知道我还可以游至少30小时”

translation.en: [reporter 5] Diana Nyad had to be carried into her boat.
translation.zh: 戴安娜·耐德被抬到船上

translation.en: She had endured 42 hours of rough water in the Florida Straits.
translation.zh: 她在佛罗里达海峡的汹涌水域中坚持了42小时

translation.en: [reporter 6] Even though saltwater had caused her eyes, lips, and tongue to swell,
translation.zh: 尽管海水导致她的眼睛、嘴唇和舌头肿胀

translation.en: the 28-year-old marathoner wanted to keep on swimming.
translation.zh: 但这位28岁的马拉松游泳选手仍然想要继续游

translation.en: I didn't wanna just give up and go back and never swim again.

translation.en: [reporter 6] She was 85 miles short of Key West.
translation.zh: 她当时距离基韦斯特还有137公里

translation.en: The sea had beaten Diana Nyad.
translation.zh: 这片海域击败戴安娜·耐德

translation.en: She's been swimming for over 24 hours.
Yeah.
The last few, barely breathing.
translation.zh: 最近的几小时 呼吸很不顺畅

translation.en: This is where we're supposed to be.
If we stop for more than three or four minutes, the currents screw us.
translation.zh: 如果我们停下超过三、四分钟洋流就会搞死我们

translation.en: -We're getting pushed east. -Toward freaking Africa.
She'd have to swim double time to make it up.
translation.zh: 这样她的游泳时间就得加倍才能补回来

translation.en: You gotta call it.
-Shit. -I know, I know.
[Bonnie] Diana, come close to the boat.
translation.zh: 戴安娜 到船这边来

translation.en: -Take off your goggles. Look at me. -[Diana gasping] Look at me.
No.
[John] We gotta get you out! You can't fight the currents.
translation.zh: 我们得拉你上船 你斗不过洋流

translation.en: Don't say it.
[John] Diana, you're swimming, but you're not going anywhere.

translation.en: It's two steps forward, fifteen back. It's impossible!

translation.en: You've done everything humanly possible. -Everything. You rock. -[Diana coughing]

translation.en: [Bonnie] Yeah, this is Mother Nature.
Honestly…
I'm not even sore.
-I'm not kidding. -[dramatic music playing]
[reporter] …pushed Nyad far east off her charted course.
translation.zh: …将耐德向东推 偏离原定航线

translation.en: Keep in mind that she is now 61 years old.
At 28 she also tried the same swim and had to quit then too
translation.zh: 28岁时 她也尝试了这项挑战 也是因为汹涌的洋流和恶劣的天气而被迫放弃

translation.en: because of rough weather and these extremely strong currents.
translation.zh: 也是因为汹涌的洋流和恶劣的天气而被迫放弃

translation.en: I'm bummed. I was rooting for her. I wonder if she's gonna try a third time.
translation.zh: 我很失望 我之前一直在为她加油 不知道她会不会第三次尝试

translation.en: [Diana in Spanish] Thank you, everyone!
[Bonnie] You just gotta be careful with her lips.
We got the oxygen here and, uh, don't touch that when new.
And, uh, Bartlett?
Say hi to Jon Rose, our new lead medic.
translation.zh: 和我们的新任首席医生乔恩·罗斯打个招呼

translation.en: Welcome to the Titanic.
Don't listen to him. He's a chronic defeatist.
translation.zh: 别听他的 他是惯性失败主义者

translation.en: -Happy to meet you. -Low expectations are key to happiness.
translation.zh: -幸会-低期待值是幸福的关键所在

translation.en: Don't let the swimmer hear you say that. [chuckling]

translation.en: [Bonnie] Hey, hey, Diana, can you slow the pace a little?

translation.en: You're at 58 strokes a minute,
translation.zh: 你现在的速度是每分钟58次划水

translation.en: so just… just take it down.
-All right. -Wait, are you timing her?
translation.zh: -好的-等等 你在给她计时吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I can hear it. You know, the slap of her hands on the water with the strokes.
translation.zh: 嗯 我能听到她划水时手拍水的声音

translation.en: That's how psychotic I've become. [chucking]
translation.zh: 所以我才变得这么神经错乱

translation.en: I gave her some of that coffee gel. You know, she's off like a rocket.
translation.zh: 我给她吃了咖啡凝胶 现在游得像火箭一样

translation.en: Hold her back as long as you can.
My stick readings say the current's gonna be roaring in a couple hours.

translation.en: All right.
[John] Looking good, folks, looking good.
translation.zh: 各位 情况看起来不错

translation.en: Watch out for icebergs.
♪ You can smile ♪ ♪ Every smile for the man ♪ ♪ Who held your hand Beneath the pale moonlight ♪
-Fire, fire, fire! Help! Fire! -Di-Diana, what is it?
translation.zh: -着火了！救命啊！-戴安娜 怎么了？

translation.en: -All right, Diana. -[Diana] Help!
-Diana, I'm right here. I'm right here. -[Diana] Fire, fire!
[Bonnie] Diana, I'm right here. Easy, easy, easy, easy.
-Here he comes. -[Jon] Oh shit!
-[Bonnie] What is it? Some jellyfish? -Oh Jesus!
[grunting] It's not a man o' war!
Luke, call the UMiami lady and… and describe it.

translation.en: [Diana] Fire, fire, fire, fire, fire!
[Bonnie] Jon Rose, get closer to her.
translation.zh: 乔恩·罗斯 靠近她一点

translation.en: -Get her to the boat. -No! Don't touch me!
translation.zh: -让她到船这边来-不要！别碰我！

translation.en: [Bonnie] Nobody's gonna touch you.
We're not gonna touch you. Just get closer to the boat.
translation.zh: 我们不碰你 你靠近船一点

translation.en: -We need you closer. -[John] Get 'em out!
[Bonnie] Diana!
Diana, now! Get closer to the boat.

translation.en: [Jon] Give her the shot! Give her the shot!
There you go. Oxygen, please.

translation.en: [Luke] UMiami says it sounds like a box jellyfish.

translation.en: They shouldn't be here. They can kill.

translation.en: Holy hell. Let's get him out the water.

translation.en: -All right. Um, I'm gonna pull you out. -[John] Jon Rose? Get him out!
translation.zh: -我把你拉上来-乔恩·罗斯！ -不要-把他拉上来！

translation.en: Diana, this is your life.
translation.zh: 戴安娜 这关系到你的性命

translation.en: -My life. My life. -[Jon Rose gasping]
[Diana] No. No! [breathing heavily]
No stay. Swim.

translation.en: -It's fine. -[Bonnie] All right.
Breathe in through your nose and out your mouth.

translation.en: [Bonnie] Breathe in with this. There you go. Here you go. Take this. Take it from me. Take it from me.
That's it.
Put it right up there. Give me a good breath. One good breath.
Good.
Don't…
don't wanna give up.
-[music fades] -[Diana] Don't… don't wanna give up.
[whispering] I know, I know.
So, she wants to keep going.
She's stable.
So, what's our position?
Are you serious?
She could die at any second and you wanna know our position?
translation.zh: 她随时可能没命你还问我们在什么位置？

translation.en: The hell are we doing here?
It's her dream. Right?
translation.zh: 这是她的梦想 对吧？

translation.en: It's… it's her call.
And we're already all the way out here.
translation.zh: 而且我们都已经到这里了

translation.en: Yeah.
All right.
If you can live with it.
Just read me our position, please.

translation.en: So the UMiami folks think
that the box jellyfish came up off the shallow reef when we left Cuba.
translation.zh: 箱型水母是在我们离开古巴时从浅水礁上来的

translation.en: Global warming. Apparently, they're breeding like crazy.
translation.zh: 全球变暖 它们显然在疯狂繁殖

translation.en: But they should be behind us now.
translation.zh: 但现在应该在我们身后了

translation.en: And, uh, Bartlett said that we didn't drift too badly
translation.zh: 还有巴特利特说我们没有偏移太多

translation.en: because you were doing so good before.
translation.zh: 因为我们之前做得非常好

translation.en: Good time, you know?
But you got to take it easy. All right? Slow.
translation.zh: 但你不能着急 好吗？慢一点

translation.en: All right, let's go.
All right, everybody, we're going.
Come on! Yeah! Yeah, yeah, yeah!
It's for the jellyfish.
Just in case.
Fantastic.
The stop kill us?

translation.en: [John] Trying to make a correction
translation.zh: 要调整一下 稍微往东北偏移了一点

translation.en: for a little northeasterly drift, but I like our position.
translation.zh: 要调整一下 稍微往东北偏移了一点 不过目前的位置不错

translation.en: [Bonnie] Wow. You never like our position.
translation.zh: 哇！你从没说过这样的话

translation.en: I know.
I gotta tell you, Bon, she's making up time.
We're 45.2 statute miles from the marina.
translation.zh: 我们现在距离码头72.7公里

translation.en: She keeps going like this, we're gonna see Florida before sunrise.
translation.zh: 她保持现在的状态日出之前 我们就能看到佛罗里达

translation.en: Look at you.
You're good to go.
Looks good. Beautiful.
Onward.
Yeah.
[Coach Nelson] This is why we swim that extra lap, this is why we run that extra mile,
translation.zh: 所以我们要多游一圈、多游一公里

translation.en: this is why we push you to your limit every single day.
translation.zh: 所以要每天逼你们到达极限

translation.en: You give me everything you got out there,
all your heart, all your strength, all your focus,
translation.zh: 全身心投入 全神贯注

translation.en: I guarantee you you're gonna leave here a champion.
-You hear me? -[girls] Yes.
Panthers on three. One, two, three.
translation.zh: 数到三喊“黑豹” 一 二 三

translation.en: [all] Panthers!
-[crowd cheering] -[Coach Nelson] Dig deep, Nyad. Come on!
Come on! Come on! Come on, come on!
Come on, Nyad!
-Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes! You did it! -[crowd cheering]
-[Diana] No! -[girls giggling] Stop! No!
[Diana] My face! My face!
Tentacles.
[Bonnie] Right! Get… get her out of the water!
Diana, stay there!
Hey, Nyad?
Nyad?
If you wanna catch a nap, guest room down the hall. Go ahead.

translation.en: [Bonnie] What's going on? What's going on?
[Bonnie] No. No, no, no, no, no.
Come on. Come on, Diana.
You can't… you can't do that now. You gotta breathe.

translation.en: Come on, baby, breathe.

translation.en: Breathe, you breathe deep.
I know you got another one in you. Come on, give me another one.

translation.en: Give me another breath.
[Bonnie] Come on. Stop messing with me, Diana. Breathe, now.

translation.en: What happened? What happened? What happened?
Blow out. Blow out, blow out, blow out, blow out.
Come on, blow out, blow out. Blow out!
Diana, blow out. Now, blow out.
Oh God.
Oh Jesus.
[John] Bonnie, Bonnie, Bonnie, Bonnie, feel this.
Yeah. [panting]
She still thinks she's swimming.
[Bonnie] You still swimming, babe?
All right, all right, you keep swimming.
And keep breathing.
I should've pulled her out.

translation.en: I should've said, "That's it. No, we're done."
Why am I not allowed to say
that it pisses me off to be felled by sea creatures,
to be rendered powerless by stupid jellyfish?
translation.zh: 居然面对水母毫无招架之力

translation.en: It's just so beneath me.
When you… when you say it's beneath you,
translation.zh: 你说你的水平怎么这么低

translation.en: that is just demeaning to us.
To all of us. To me, to Bartlett, Jon Rose, to Luke, to Dee.

translation.en: -We worked hard, Diana. -I know you did.
translation.zh: -我们很努力-我知道你们很努力

translation.en: Yeah, and we were scared shitless.
-You've any idea what it was like for me? -[Diana] I know.
translation.zh: -知道我当时什么感觉吗？-我知道

translation.en: No, no, you don't know.
I watched you die, Diana.
translation.zh: 我看着你死去 戴安娜

translation.en: For 15 seconds, I thought you were dead.
translation.zh: 那15秒 我以为你死了

translation.en: All because I said okay to you again.
translation.zh: 都是因为我又一次答应了你

translation.en: I said, "Oh yeah, okay, sure."
translation.zh: 我说：“对 好的 没问题”

translation.en: I… I can't do that again. I can't.
Yeah, but I wasn't. I didn't. I'm here.

translation.en: I'm… I'm here, I'm okay, and I'm not quitting.
translation.zh: 没错 但我没死 我现在好好活着呢 我没事 我不会放弃

translation.en: Okay?
We have learned so much each time. I've… I've learned about myself, too.
translation.zh: 我们每次都学到了很多 我也更了解自己了

translation.en: Yeah, okay, what… what did you learn?
I don't wanna look back and feel like I could've fought harder.
translation.zh: 我不希望回头看时觉得自己原本可以更努力

translation.en: I hate that feeling.
[Bonnie] I know that. What else?
Look… look, one more time.
One more time. That's it.

translation.en: We spend the next year training,

translation.en: but also fixing the jellyfish problem.
translation.zh: 同时也解决水母的问题

translation.en: I actually got a lead on a box jellyfish expert.
translation.zh: 我找到了一个箱型水母专家

translation.en: How do you already have a lead on a box jellyfish expert?
It's called the internet, Bonnie.
Look, she's a doctor.
She seems like a really cool lady.
translation.zh: 看样子是一个很酷的女士

translation.en: Do you have any idea how exhausting you are as a friend?
translation.zh: 有你这样的朋友真是累死人

translation.en: [woman] In the future, never let them give her an Epi injection.
translation.zh: 以后绝不要给她注射肾上腺素

translation.en: Box stings cause epinephrine to spike.
translation.zh: 被箱型水母刺伤会导致肾上腺素飙升

translation.en: She's lucky she didn't overdose.
translation.zh: 她没产生过量反应算走运了

translation.en: Uh, listen, I told her I was only going if I could protect her from the box.
translation.zh: 我跟她说过 能保证她不被箱型水母攻击我才同意挑战

translation.en: So, what do you think? Is this crazy?
translation.zh: 你有什么想法？是不是很疯狂？

translation.en: She can't get stung again.
You don't build up immunity to the venom. It works in the opposite way.
translation.zh: 对于这种毒素 无法建立免疫 恰恰相反

translation.en: -[Bonnie sighing] -So there cannot be a next time.
The suit, I designed it expressly for this purpose. It'll help.
translation.zh: 我为此专门设计了这件泳衣会有帮助

translation.en: But yeah, I'd say this is pretty crazy,
translation.zh: 但是没错 这确实很疯狂

translation.en: but it's also very punk rock.
Hello? Bonnie? This is brutal.
Yeah. Well, we can't help you. It's regulation. You gotta put it on yourself.
translation.zh: 我们帮不了你 这是规定 你得自己穿

translation.en: Well, I can't do it.
Then don't.
But you will die.
[Diana] Listen, could you come with us?
translation.zh: 听我说 你能和我们一起吗 ？

translation.en: It would be a great adventure.
translation.zh: 这将是一次伟大的冒险

translation.en: [reporter] Baumgartner says he's not afraid of dying on this jump
translation.zh: 鲍姆加特纳说自己不害怕在这次跳跃中丧命

translation.en: 'cause he's worked hard… [Bonnie] Woo-hoo!
translation.zh: 因为他费了千辛万苦才走到这一步

translation.en: [reporter] He's base jumped from…
What's going on? What is it?
-Where's the remote? -What?
-[reporter] …and from the Christ the-- -Check it out.
[woman] It's the hardest swim in the world today.
This is the ultimate of ultramarathon swimming.
translation.zh: 是超级马拉松游泳的终极桂冠

translation.en: Are you kidding me?
She's… she's… she's like the baby.
No, but it's possibly harder,
possibly because no one's been able to do it.
translation.zh: 也许是因为还没人完成过

translation.en: Yeah, we know no one's been able to do it.
translation.zh: 对 我们知道没人完成过

translation.en: -That's the whole damn point! -Hey! Can you stop talking? I wanna hear.
translation.zh: -就是因为他妈没人完成过！-别说了 好吗？我要听

translation.en: [woman] I will not wear a wetsuit, I will not use a shark cage…
translation.zh: 我不会穿潜水服 也不会用防鲨笼

translation.en: I can't believe this.
This… this is my window. She's stealing my swim!
translation.zh: 这是我的时间窗口她想偷走我的挑战！

translation.en: That-- No, that's what I'm gonna do.
translation.zh: 不行 这是我要做的事

translation.en: God! Where's a box jellyfish when you need one?
translation.zh: 天呐！箱型水母在哪儿呢？现在正需要！

translation.en: I'm gonna pretend I didn't hear that.
-It stopped. -[dog panting]
Okay, her tracker stopped.
translation.zh: 好的 她的追踪器停了

translation.en: Where?
Where'd it stop?
-Right there. -What?
Is it instrument failure? Or, wait.
-Wait-- -Did they pull her out?
Lookit, lookit, lookit. Wait a minute.
Remote.
[reporter] Painful stings from a swarm of the creatures
just 11 hours into the swim forced McCardell to ditch the whole idea.
translation.zh: 麦卡德尔就因被一群生物刺痛而被迫放弃挑战

translation.en: -Yes! -Yes!
Yes, yes, yes, yes!
[woman] I had one coming out of my mouth. I was pulling it, this tentacle, out of my mouth,
translation.zh: 我从嘴巴里拉出一根触须

translation.en: but I ended up just begging them.
I'm like, "I need to get out. This is… this is not going away."
translation.zh: 我心想：“我得上船 没戏了

translation.en: "It's only gonna get worse. Like, this is the start."
translation.zh: 只会变得更糟糕 而这才刚刚开始”

translation.en: -[reporter] Goodness. -[woman] I'm not coming back.
translation.zh: -天呐！-我不会再来了 到此为止

translation.en: -[reporter] You won't attempt again? -[woman] No.
translation.zh: -你不会再次尝试？-没错 邦妮 醒醒

translation.en: Bonnie, Bonnie, wake up.
Bonnie.
-What? -We have got to go to Cuba, now.
translation.zh: 我们得去古巴 现在就去

translation.en: All of my models say no, all right?
translation.zh: 我所有的模型都说不行

translation.en: We've got the Atlantic gyre stalled above the 17th parallel,
translation.zh: 大西洋环流在北纬17度停滞不前

translation.en: we've got storm systems coming off the coast of Africa,
translation.zh: 还有来自非洲海岸的风暴系统

translation.en: not to mention the Gulf.
We'll have nothing but huge peaks if we bump up against that damn east wind.
translation.zh: 如果我们碰上他妈东风就会遭遇巨浪

translation.en: This is not our window.
-Well, just check the models again. -My models are good, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -再查一遍模型-不好意思 我的模型没问题

translation.en: Do you like the idea of a full-tilt current?
Walls of seawater smacking you in the face?
translation.zh: 喜欢海水墙打在你的脸上？

translation.en: Puking up as you get sucked east toward the Bahamas?
translation.zh: 一边吐一边被向东吸往巴哈马群岛？

translation.en: Does that sound like fun to you?
If we wait any longer, the season will end. It will be too cold.

translation.en: I'm aware.
Look, it's not the only swim in the world.
translation.zh: 全世界又不是只有这里能游

translation.en: You know we could go someplace else. Guam is nice this time of year.

translation.en: -Guam? -[John] What's wrong with Guam?
It's not Cuba!
[John] When are you gonna listen to my expertise, Diana?

translation.en: Oh, that's right, you know everything.
translation.zh: 噢 没错 你什么都懂

translation.en: No, you're the expert. Fine. But I'm the CEO of the operation.
translation.zh: 你是专家 没错但我是这个项目的首席执行官

translation.en: -The CEO? -[Diana] We're going.
-I'm not waiting a year in training again. -It's too dangerous, Diana.
translation.zh: -我不会再训练等一年-太危险了

translation.zh: 我联系了亚特兰大的气象专家格雷格说可以出发

translation.en: Oh, well, if Greg says so. Who the hell is Greg?

translation.en: I've never even heard of him. This isn't his call.

translation.en: Yeah, you're right. It's not. It's mine.

translation.en: I'm in charge. That's the deal. And guess what? We're going.
translation.zh: 说好的我负责 我决定出发

translation.en: Come on, what the hell? Huh?
[Bonnie] Bartlett?
Can we talk?
I'm… I'm sorry about that. That was…
translation.zh: 刚才的事 真不好意思

translation.en: Does she think I don't wanna get out there?
Elke and I canceled seven charters this month
translation.zh: 我和埃尔克这个月取消了七趟包船

translation.en: so I could do this.
I'm trying to look out for people's lives here.
translation.zh: 我是为了大家的生命着想

translation.en: I know. I know.
Jesus, and, I mean, look at you.
I've … I've watched you stand on that transom
translation.zh: 我看着你连续40小时站在船尾

translation.en: for 40 hours straight peeing over the side of the boat
translation.zh: 我看着你连续40小时站在船尾 在船边尿尿

translation.en: so you didn't have to leave her for a second. Does she see that?
translation.zh: 就为了一秒都不离开她 她看见了吗？

translation.en: Does she ever say thank you?
-She does, in her own way-- -She plays you like a fiddle.
translation.zh: -她用自己的方法说的…-她在操控你

translation.en: Hey. Look, you don't know.
-I mean, she and I, we-- -Oh, come on, Bonnie.
You put her over your own better judgment every single time.
translation.zh: 你每次都因为她而判断失误

translation.en: Look, it's a risk.
Okay? Shit.
I mean, we've come this far.
We gotta let her try.
[clicking tongue] Oh, come on. What… what are you gonna do?
translation.zh: 拜托 你打算怎么做？

translation.en: You gonna go home and you gonna sail around a bunch of tourists the whole season?
Come on.
We're so close.
♪ You take another look into my heart ♪
[John] I told her this wasn't our window!
translation.zh: 我跟她说了时机不合适！

translation.en: That's two seconds apart.
We gotta get the kayakers and pull 'em in.
translation.zh: 得用皮划艇把他们拉上来

translation.en: -Dee! Hold north! -[Dee] Shit.
Forty-nine hours in. [groaning]
[John] Christ we're taking on water!
Bonnie, get her out!
Diana!
Diana!
-Diana! -[Nico] Diana!
-Nico! Do you see her? -[Nico] No!
Diana! Diana!
[Bonnie] Diana!
[whispering] It's okay.
Nice. That's it, Nyad. That's it.
It's undeniable.
And if you are receptive to coaching…
Your shirt.
[Diana counting indistinctly] No!
[man] You will never see me again!
[Bonnie faintly] Diana! [Bonnie] Diana!
Diana! [Bonnie] Diana!
Where is she?
[John] Diana!
[Bonnie] Diana!
Diana! Come into the boat! We're pulling you out!
translation.zh: 戴安娜！上船来！我们把你拉上来！

translation.en: No! I'm staying in! I can do it, Bon!
translation.zh: 不！我不上船！我行的 邦妮！

translation.en: Are you out of your mind? No!
[Diana] It'll pass!
No! I swear to God! I'm not--
translation.zh: 我向神发誓 我不会…

translation.en: [Bonnie] Bartlett's boat is flooding!
I'm not risking human life.
[Diana] We can wait it out!
You tell me that I should die for this!
translation.zh: 你的意思是我要为这个送命吗？

translation.en: Well, it was intended to be our feel-good story this week,
translation.zh: 原本应当是本周一个令人愉快的故事

translation.en: but it didn't quite turn out that way.
translation.zh: 但故事却没有如此发展

translation.en: Diana Nyad is back on dry land tonight.
translation.zh: 戴安娜·耐德今晚回到陆地

translation.en: Her goal of becoming the first person to swim from Cuba to Florida
translation.zh: 她成为首位不使用防鲨笼从古巴游到佛罗里达的目标

translation.en: without a shark cage ended early this morning.
translation.zh: 她成为首位不使用防鲨笼从古巴游到佛罗里达的目标 今天早上提前结束

translation.en: She did cover about 48 miles,
which means she could've crossed the English Channel twice,
translation.zh: 相当于两次横跨英吉利海峡

translation.en: but could go no farther.
The only one who gets to decide if I'm through is me.
translation.zh: 是不是到此为止 只有我能决定

translation.en: You may not be done, but everyone's exhausted.
translation.zh: 你也许还没完 但大家都筋疲力尽了

translation.en: All right, you majorly offended Bartlett, and, uh, Nico's gotta get back to work.
translation.zh: 你严重冒犯了巴特利特 尼可得回去工作

translation.en: He's got a new gig repairing A/Cs.
translation.zh: 他找了一份修空调的新工作

translation.en: Nico says it's the adventure of his lifetime.
translation.zh: 尼可说要一生为之拼搏

translation.en: You really don't get it, do you? What this is like for us?
translation.zh: 你真的不明白我们的感受 对吧？

translation.en: We're broke.
The time, the emotional toll. I mean, it's been years, Diana.
translation.zh: 时间、情绪上不堪重负 已经好几年了 戴安娜

translation.en: Well, suck it up.
[scoffing] We're a team, right?
translation.zh: 我们是一个团队 对吧？

translation.en: Your superiority complex is really screwed up, you know that?
translation.zh: 你的优越感真的很糟糕 知道吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Well, everyone should have a superiority complex.
translation.zh: 对 每个人都应该有优越感

translation.en: Everyone should feel like the star of their own life.
translation.zh: 每个人都应该觉得自己是自己人生中的明星

translation.en: Yeah, exactly. My life! My life!
And… and… and I got things that I wanna do.
Yeah? Like what?
I don't know. [scoffing]
I mean, that's… that's the crazy part. I don't… I don't even know.
translation.zh: 这确实很离谱 我都不知道自己想要什么 想做什么

translation.en: What do I want, you know? What… what do I wanna do?
translation.zh: 我都不知道自己想要什么 想做什么

translation.en: But guess what? I get to decide, not you.
translation.zh: 但是这要由我来决定而不是你决定！

translation.en: I just think that you need to make peace with the possibility of my death.
translation.zh: 我只是觉得你应该接受我可能死掉这个事实

translation.en: [Bonnie] What does that mean?
I would do it for you if it made you happy.
translation.zh: 如果能使你快乐 我也会为你这样做

translation.en: Oh, would you? Would you do that?
Yes. Imagine knowing, in your bones,
translation.zh: 没错 想象一下 在你的内心深处

translation.en: that you could do something that only you could do. Like fate.
translation.zh: 你知道有一件事只有你能做到就像宿命一样

translation.en: Enough with the fate, Diana.
-[Diana] Nyad-- -I know what your name means!
-My father-- -[Bonnie] He was an asshole.
Yes, he was an asshole,
but he understood my destiny!
This isn't about you or… or your destiny,
translation.zh: 重点不是你和你的宿命

translation.en: this is about me, okay?
For once this is about me!
translation.zh: 就这一次 重点是我！

translation.en: And… and you don't… you don't… you don't even think of me.
You just… you just want me to, like, tag along with you.
No, of course I think about you.
I know what you're capable of better than you do.
translation.zh: 我比你更知道你的本事

translation.en: Listen to yourself. That is so patronizing. I can't--
translation.zh: 听听你自己说的话一副高高在上的样子

translation.en: Look, I know that the world wants me to shut my mouth
translation.zh: 我知道全世界都想让我闭嘴

translation.en: and sit down and wait to die,
but I didn't think you did.
Stop.
I can't.
I won't. I will not accept defeat.
Are you with me?
No.
Yeah, but your coach. Here you are, resting up to compete.
translation.zh: 对 但是你的教练 你正在休息 为比赛作准备

translation.en: When your mind and your body have to be in sync.
translation.zh: 你的头脑与身体必须同步

translation.en: [Diana] And you think I swam well in the state meets?
translation.zh: 你觉得我在州际比赛中游得好吗？

translation.en: He would say, you know, "You can't tell anyone about this."
translation.zh: 他会说：“这件事你不能告诉任何人

translation.en: "First, it's so special."
"We have something so special, so you can't tell anybody."
translation.zh: 这是我们很特别的事所以你不能告诉任何人

translation.en: "No one will understand."
"You'll be kicked out of school and you'll never be the Olympic swimmer
translation.zh: 你会被赶出学校永远成不了奥运游泳选手

translation.en: because you'll lose me."
"You're a little girl and you don't understand,
translation.zh: 你是小姑娘 你不明白

translation.en: but I'm a man and I need this and someday you'll understand."
translation.zh: 但我是成年人 我有需要有一天你会明白”

translation.en: [Diana] Attempt number four.
Here I am at the launch, nerves screaming.
translation.zh: 这是我出发时候的场景 特别紧张

translation.en: No idea what lies ahead of me but resolved by sheer will,
translation.zh: 不知道前方会遇到什么 但是凭借着坚强的意志力

translation.en: compelled by the power of the human spirit.
translation.zh: 被人类精神的力量所驱使

translation.en: Courage.
Uh, this is Bonnie, my coach.
She is in charge of making sure that I get my calories and electrolytes.
translation.zh: 她负责给我提供充足的能量和电解质

translation.en: Bonnie again.
You… you don't leave room for imagining defeat.
You really do believe that you're going to make it every single time,
but…
Um, I mean, four tries and four failures.
translation.zh: 四次尝试 四次失败

translation.en: Okay.
Oh come on, Nyad, stupid bitch.
translation.zh: 快开啊 耐德 笨蛋！

translation.en: Yep?
Uh, are you still mad at me?
Because I am so sorry.
Some of the things I said,
and my attitude, was… it… out of proportion.
Thank you.
And no, I'm not mad.
But if you're asking me to go again, I… I… I just can't.
translation.zh: 但如果你要再找我去 我去不了

translation.en: You know, I… I got shit going on.
Mortgage to pay, you know? I gotta get back to work, you know?
translation.zh: 有房贷要还 我得回去工作

translation.en: Life catches up at some point.
Yeah, no, I understand.
Maybe it just can't be done, you know?
translation.zh: 也许这件事就是不可能做到

translation.en: What, I'm… [sighing] I'm just supposed to accept
translation.zh: 大家对于是否可能的标准如此低下而平庸

translation.en: everyone's denigrating and mediocre standards of what's possible?
translation.zh: 大家对于是否可能的标准如此低下而平庸 就要我这么接受吗？

translation.en: Bonnie's done with me, too.
Oh, cut the shit, Bonnie loves you. You two are family.
translation.zh: 少来 邦妮太爱你了 你们俩是一家人

translation.en: You know, it's not that I don't know that I'm this way,
translation.zh: 我并不是不知道自己是这个样子

translation.en: that… that I'm so…
Radical?
That's a nice way to say it.
Why is it so hard?
Yeah, why is it so hard to be a person?
translation.zh: 对 做人为什么这么难？

translation.en: You know, there was nothing like that feeling,
being out there on those days when we were just jamming
translation.zh: 那些日子里 我们在海上 充满活力

translation.en: and… and you were going strong
and the dolphins were following you,
and… and me and Bonnie and the team were super in sync thinking,
translation.zh: 我和邦妮还有整个团队都很默契

translation.en: "Hell yeah, we… we can do this. We… we can pull this off."
This… this crazy thing we all believed in.
translation.zh: 我们当时都相信能完成那个不可能完成的任务

translation.en: That high.
Yeah, that… that was some good shit, right?
translation.zh: 嗯 确实很爽 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah, no, I… I never saw that, but I felt it.
translation.zh: 嗯 我从来都没看见过 但我感觉到了

translation.en: Oh, that's true.
-You know, you… you were underwater. -[Diana] Yeah.
Singing to myself in the dark. [chuckling]
Kind of badass, Diana.
Very much so.
Well, uh, I… I… I… I'd better--
No, no, yeah, yeah, of course.
Goodnight, John.
Goodnight, Diana.
[Diana] I've been calling.
-I left messages. -Oh.
Diana, I just… I… I don't wanna get into this again.
translation.zh: 戴安娜 我不想再谈这件事

translation.en: No, no, I know.
I just wanted to see you, talk to you.
translation.zh: 我只是想见见你 和你聊聊

translation.en: [softly] Fine.
I read in the paper that, uh, Jack Nelson died.
translation.zh: 我在报纸上看到杰克·尼尔森死了

translation.en: Yeah.
I thought you'd call me.
translation.zh: 我想着你会给我打电话

translation.en: Well, good riddance.
I hate victim shit.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢搞受害者那一套

translation.en: I know you do.
Yeah, he's still in the Swimming Hall of Fame
translation.zh: 他还是在游泳名人堂里

translation.en: even after all of us came forward,
translation.zh: 即便我们大家都站出来

translation.en: said we were abused by him, said it in public.
Can you believe that?
God!
I… I… I wish I could've killed him myself.
translation.zh: 真希望我能亲手杀了他

translation.en: -And I would have, too. -Yeah?
-Yeah. -How would you have done it?
Chop his dick off.
Dull knife, granite cutting board. Just let him bleed to death.
translation.zh: 钝刀 花岗岩菜板 让他流血而死

translation.en: Why granite?
I don't know, that's just how I pictured it.
translation.zh: 不知道 我就是这么想象的

translation.en: Yeah. Well, he didn't damage me, he didn't throw me off course.
translation.zh: 我没被他毁掉 也没偏离人生轨迹

translation.en: I'm good, I'm fine.
But then there are moments when it's like I'm 14 again and…
translation.zh: 但有时候会觉得自己又回到了14岁

translation.en: it's… it's like his voice is coming out of me,
translation.zh: 就好像我在发出他的声音

translation.en: and I get so mad at myself.
[voice breaking] I mean, why didn't I fight harder?
translation.zh: 我当时为什么不更努力地反抗呢？

translation.en: I was a force.
Oh baby, baby, you know… you know it doesn't work like that.
translation.zh: 宝贝 你知道不是这么简单的

translation.en: You know that.
I do. I do know that.
It's just, I…
I mean, I…
He was so nice to me.
I mean, at first, you know.
I… I wrote "I love Coach Nelson" on my notebook,
translation.zh: 我在我的记事本上写“我爱尼尔森教练”

translation.en: and he saw that I…
You know? Oh God, I never told anybody that.
You are a force.
Swim or no swim, you are a force.
translation.zh: 不论游不游 你都很坚强

translation.en: Know that.
[sniffling] I know.
And I, um… I'm not gonna stop.
I'm free to keep trying.
[Bonnie] Yeah, you are, Diana.
[Diana] So, I'm gonna… train and crew up,
and, uh, see you when I get back.
translation.zh: 回来之后 我会来找你

translation.en: -We'll have dinner or something. -[Bonnie] Sure.
Okay.
You know I'm always rooting for you.
Team Nyad.
[Diana] Hey, James?
I want you drafting to my left, okay, so I can see you when I breathe.
translation.zh: 你在我的左边我呼吸的时候就能看见你

translation.en: And every 90 minutes,
if you could grab one of those, uh, packets of goo from the cooler.
translation.zh: 从冷藏箱里拿一包糊糊

translation.en: Bonnie, my handler, she usually just squirts it directly into my mouth.
translation.zh: 我的教练邦妮通常会直接往我嘴里喷

translation.en: You know what? Never mind.
It's okay.
And… and I'll… I'll be ready in a few minutes.
translation.zh: 我几分钟之后就准备好了

translation.en: Gus, want to take a hike?
Come on, puppy. Let's go.
translation.zh: 来吧 狗狗 我们走

translation.en: [woman] …should I have done?
Doesn't everything die at last and too soon?
translation.zh: 最后一切都会太快地死去 不是吗？

translation.en: Tell me, what is it you plan to do with your one wild and precious life?
translation.zh: 生命只有一次 狂野而珍贵你打算怎么过？

translation.en: Jesus, Mary Oliver. I mean, give me a break.
[reporter] In an interview with public radio,
translation.zh: 在接受公共电台的采访时

translation.en: Oliver noted that simplicity was important to her.
translation.zh: 奥利弗说简单对她来说很重要

translation.en: Her poems are often a joyful celebration of nature,
translation.zh: 她的诗常常欢乐地赞美大自然

translation.en: but she also chronicled the abuse she endured as a child growing up in rural Ohio.
translation.zh: 但也记录了儿时在俄亥俄州农村所遭受的虐待

translation.en: As she told us in 2012,
she found a haven in two great passions.
translation.zh: 她在两个爱好中找到了避风港

translation.en: She loved the natural world and dead poets.
translation.zh: 她热爱大自然 也热爱已故的诗人 她认为自己是…

translation.en: All right.
I'm gonna say a few things.
Bonnie, what the--
Don't interrupt me.
All right. I'm here because… I thought about it,
translation.zh: 我来这里 因为我已经考虑过了

translation.en: and…
you've been my person since we were, like, 30 running around like idiots.
translation.zh: 从我们30岁时像笨蛋到处瞎跑开始 咱们就是死党

translation.en: You know, we do things together. We do fun shit, boring shit, hard shit.
translation.zh: 我们在一起做开心的事、无聊的事、困难的事

translation.en: I tried doing my own thing, but it just wasn't the same.
translation.zh: 我尝试自己一个人 但是不一样

translation.en: You're not a quitter.
The point is,
we're getting old together. [chuckling]
You know, we're getting old, and if you die…
translation.zh: 我们在变老 如果你死掉

translation.en: I wanna be the last person you see.
translation.zh: 我要做你最后看见的那个人

translation.en: Don't die.
But if you do, I'll be right there with you.
translation.zh: 但如果你死掉 我要陪在你身边

translation.en: [reporter] At 28 years old, she set out to become the first person
translation.zh: 28岁时 她立志成为 不使用防鲨笼横渡古巴到佛罗里达166公里海域第一人

translation.en: to swim 103 miles from Cuba to Florida without a shark cage.
translation.zh: 不使用防鲨笼横渡古巴到佛罗里达166公里海域第一人 （耐德第五次尝试 她会成功吗？）

translation.en: Three and a half decades after starting her quest,
translation.zh: 她的挑战征程开始35年之后

translation.en: sixty-four-year-old Diana Nyad
hopes this will be the year she completes it.
translation.zh: 希望今年能够完成挑战

translation.en: [reporter 2] And this is her fifth attempt to swim from Havana to Florida.
translation.zh: 这是她第五次挑战从哈瓦那游到佛罗里达

translation.en: [reporter 3] As always, she'll fight wind and currents,
translation.zh: 一如既往 她将与风浪、洋流、脱水及体温过低作斗争

translation.en: dehydration and hypothermia,
translation.zh: 她将与风浪、洋流、脱水及体温过低作斗争

translation.en: and over these three days that Nyad will need to reach Florida,
translation.zh: 耐德游到佛罗里达需要三天时间

translation.en: [Diana] Wonderful to see you.
[Nico] You made it.
Yeah.
Did you do this?
No, I…
Elke says we're already so broke, what's a little more broke?
translation.zh: 埃尔克说我们已经一贫如洗还能穷到哪里去呢？

translation.en: But the green light is my call. Capisce?
translation.zh: 但是出发时间要由我来定 明白吗？

translation.en: Your call.
-[Diana] What? -You look remarkably like a seal.
Ugh. What is with this… this new mask? It's somehow even worse.
translation.zh: 这新面罩是怎么回事？感觉更糟糕了

translation.en: Well, Angel insisted 'cause someone swallowed a box.
translation.zh: 安吉儿说一定要用因为有人吞下了一只箱型水母

translation.en: [Diana] Ugh. What happened?
What do you think happened? They died.
Diana, everyone, we're officially on red alert.
translation.zh: 戴安娜 各位 我们正式进入戒备状态

translation.en: I think we have a window. Tomorrow, we go for it.
translation.zh: 时机合适 我们明天出发

translation.en: -[Diana] Yes! -[Bonnie] All right.
Good. We're doing it.
-Nyads, water nymph, destiny. Right? -[contemplative music playing]
translation.zh: 耐德 水中仙子“宁芙” 宿命 对吧？

translation.en: You know, the whole thing with Aris…
how he's not my biological dad. I mean,
so technically, I'm not even--
translation.zh: 所以严格地说 我根本不是…

translation.en: Listen to me.
There's no one more Nyad than you.
translation.zh: 没人比你更担得起“耐德”这个名字

translation.en: Onward.
[Diana] Courage!
[softly] Damn it.
Take a look.
[man] Shields couldn't have gone down, right?
translation.zh: 屏障不可能失效 对吧？

translation.en: Shit.
I'm gonna see what's going on with the shield. I'm going out, okay?
translation.zh: 我去检查一下屏障怎么回事

translation.en: [man] All right.
[Diana] Seven hundred thirty-two…
[Bonnie] Wait. What's happening?
-[boat engine revving] -[Bonnie] What is that?
-Jesus Christ. -See?
-Should we pull her? -[Luke] Bonnie!
-Get her as close to the boat as possible. -Cut the engine.
translation.zh: -让她尽可能靠近船-关掉发动机

translation.en: Diana!
[Bonnie] Diana! Come towards the boat.
No splashing, just a little… little baby breaststroke.
translation.zh: 不要拍水 小幅度蛙泳

translation.en: What's going on?
We're fixing the shark shield. Don't you worry.
translation.zh: 正在修复防鲨屏障 别担心

translation.en: [Bonnie] Don't look.
-Is it on or off? Tell us. -[Luke] I think it's back on.
translation.zh: -修好没有？说啊！-我觉得应该修好了

translation.en: He thinks it's back on.
[man] All clear.
-Yes! Yes! -[all applauding]
-[John] Yeah! Good job, guys. Thank you. -Yes!
translation.zh: -非常好 各位 谢谢-太好了！

translation.en: Thanks, everyone.
♪ Keeps me searching for a heart of gold ♪
[Diana] It's cutting my mouth.
You have to wear it just until dawn, then we'll be out of the woods.
translation.zh: 必须得戴到天亮 然后就安全了

translation.en: Oh, cap first. Yes.
translation.zh: 噢 对 先戴帽子

translation.en: [softly] Goddammit.
-Here you go. -Hey, thanks.
-Been meaning to ask you. -[John] Hmm?
How'd she rope you back in?
We had a nice chat.
And, um… [clearing throat]
I'm sick, Bonnie.
-Oh. -She doesn't know.
[Bonnie] Oh jeez.
I'm trying to take it on the chin.
[softly] Yeah.
Anyway,
I figured I had one last adventure in me. [exhaling]

translation.en: [softly] Yeah.
-The swimmer. -[John] The swimmer.
[Diana] Four hundred seventy-four,
four hundred seventy-five,
four hundred seventy-six.
[John] Hey, Bonnie.
Finally, we hit the stream just right.

translation.en: It's sweeping her north.
We just gotta keep her cranking.
[Bonnie] Diana. Diana.
Come on in. Come on.
There you go. Come on. Baby breaststroke, that's it.

translation.en: [Bonnie] Good job.
-[Diana groaning] -Here you go.
I'm not gonna make you eat anything. No.

translation.en: Just, uh-- You gotta get some fluids down.
At least four and a half more ounces.
That's what you need. There you go.
[Bonnie] I know.
You're swallowing a lot of seawater.
-[Diana coughing] -Yeah, see?
All right, you're going to Florida.

translation.en: That way.
You're going to Florida, Key West.

translation.en: That's it. You're doing great.
-Just one good one. One good one. -[Diana groaning]
That's it. That's it.
Second one.
We just hit 75 miles.
This is as far as we've ever made it before.
translation.zh: 已经破了我们自己的记录

translation.en: I… I didn't think I'd see it here. The Taj Mahal.
translation.zh: 没想到会在这里看见泰姬陵

translation.en: It's stupendous.
Head straight towards it, Diana.
translation.zh: 直接朝它游过去 戴安娜

translation.en: It's that way.
So, down the yellow brick road?
Yep. Yellow brick road to the Taj Mahal.
translation.zh: 对 黄砖路通向泰姬陵

translation.en: Just keep moving.
-[John chuckling] -[Bonnie] Just keep moving.
[reporter] Ms. Nyad holds Italy's Capri-to-Naples world record.
translation.zh: 耐德小姐保持着 意大利卡普里岛到那不勒斯的世界纪录

translation.en: [Diana] …recognition fantasies I have, they shouldn't be fantasies…
translation.zh: 意大利卡普里岛到那不勒斯的世界纪录

translation.en: [reporter 2] She swum 32 miles.
[Diana] Feeling that my body is as gargantuan as a whale,
translation.zh: 感到我的身体像鲸鱼一样巨大

translation.en: I'm 30 feet wide, with incredible strength and shoulders,
translation.zh: 我9米宽 有强大的力量和肩膀

translation.en: and I'm just muscling my way through that water nothing's gonna stop me.
translation.zh: 在水中奋力前行 没有什么能阻止我

translation.en: Gulls were dive-bombing my calf,
translation.zh: 我以为有许多海鸥在俯冲轰炸我的小腿

translation.en: and I thought there was blood all down the front of my face.
Sixty hours nonstop in the open sea.
translation.zh: 在开放海域不间断地游60小时

translation.en: It's like I'm getting that gold medal at the Olympic games.
translation.zh: 就像赢得奥运金牌一样

translation.en: This swim is much, much closer to impossible than it is to possible.
translation.zh: 这项挑战几乎是不可能完成的任务

translation.en: I feel like, uh, I have a moment of immortality when I get to the other side.
translation.zh: 到达彼岸时我感觉自己有一刹那是不朽的

translation.en: Hey, you. Yeah, you. Keep going.
translation.zh: 哎 叫你呢 继续游

translation.en: [John] Bonnie. Bonnie!
Do you see it?
Can you see it?
[Bonnie] Diana.
Diana.
-Come on. -[Diana groaning]
[Bonnie] That's it, that's it.
You're never gonna put that mask on again.

translation.en: Off with the goggles.
[Bonnie] All right.
Diana, look at me. I need you to look at me.

translation.en: -[Diana] No. -Look at me.
-It's over? -[Bonnie] No.
No. I… I-- Did we drift?

translation.en: I can make it up.
-[Bonnie] No, no-- -Bonnie, I… I'm not getting out.
-Diana, stop, stop. Look over there. -[Diana] I can make it up.

translation.en: -Look. See that? -[Diana] I'm not getting out.
translation.zh: -看那边 你看见了吗？-我不退出

translation.en: You see that, the horizon? Look at the horizon.

translation.en: You see it?
[Diana] Is it the sun?
No, that's not the sun, babe.
Those are the lights of Key West.
Diana, what I'm telling you is, there's not gonna be another night.

translation.en: Just one big push.
If you can really bring it, if you can really, really bring it,
then you're gonna reach Florida today.
But there's still a long way to go, all right?
At least 12 more hours.
Babe, you gotta… you need to dig deep.

translation.en: You can dig deep. All right?

translation.en: Now, get some of this into you.
[Bonnie] You're doing great, babe. You're doing great.

Gotta stay in closer to the line of the boat.
You're not done yet.
Slow down.
She's going the wrong way, and she's wasting strokes.

translation.en: [Bonnie] I know.
I need another tenth of a knot, or it's over.

translation.en: I know. Shit!
What are you doing? Bonnie? Bonnie.
Really, Bonnie?
Diana? Diana, woo-hoo!
Diana?
Bon, you're in the water with me.
[Bonnie] Now, listen to me.
All you gotta do… all you gotta do is just swim a little bit.
-All right? -Don't touch me.
-No. I'm not gonna touch you. -[Diana] You can't touch me.
We're in this together. Right? We do everything together. All right?
translation.zh: 我们一起加油 好吗？我们做什么事都一起

translation.en: But you don't have to… you don't have to think about what's going on.
translation.zh: 你不用去想现在是什么情况

translation.en: All you gotta do is just take a couple of good strokes.

translation.en: All right? You think you can do that?
Huh? How about… how about… how about five… five good strokes?

translation.en: -Come on. I know you can. -[Diana groaning]

translation.en: See, I know you can because I know what a beast you are.
I'm not gonna let you give up.
See if you can do it. I bet you can.

Just one. Only one, and then we go.
One good stroke.
That's it, that's it. Beautiful.
-Just one more stroke. Just one more. -[Diana moaning]
[Bonnie] That's it.
One more. [chuckling]
-Yeah. One more. -[groaning] Bonnie--
No, no, no, no. No talking. You just save that breath for Key West.

translation.en: I love you.
I love you, too.
Come on. One more stroke, babe.

translation.en: Just one more. You got it.

translation.en: That's it.
That's it, power!
Come on, power!
One big stroke.
Yeah, that's a good one.
That's it, babe.
You're going that way.
That way. You got it, babe.
