-We're moving, aren't we? -We're moving, Bon.
Guys, we're so close.
What's wrong, Bartlett?
-[John sniffling] -You got this.
For the record, I got sand in my eyes.

translation.en: Let's go, Dee.
Diana!
You got this!
Hell yeah! [laughing]
[reporter] It is nothing less than remarkable.
[reporter 2] Her swimming speed increased during the middle of the voyage
after she was picked up by fast-moving currents.
translation.zh: 因为她遇上了快速流动的洋流

translation.en: [reporter 3] She averaged about two miles per hour with the strong current.
translation.zh: 在强力洋流的影响下她的平均速度约为每小时3.2公里

translation.en: [reporter 4] She was accompanied by roughly 40 people on 4 boats.
translation.zh: 有大约40人坐着四艘船伴随着她

translation.en: [reporter 3] From above, you can see Nyad in crystal-clear water
translation.zh: 从空中俯瞰可以看到耐德在清澈的水中前行

translation.en: as she got one stroke closer to the shore of Key West.
translation.zh: 即将到达基韦斯特岸边

translation.en: [man] Diana Nyad's about to land!
[man] Diana Nyad, ladies and gentlemen!
translation.zh: 戴安娜·耐德来了 女士们 先生们！

translation.en: Nyad! Nyad! [crowd chanting] Nyad! Nyad!
No one touches her or she'll be disqualified!
translation.zh: 谁都不要碰她否则她会被取消资格！

translation.en: Everybody back!
Back! No touching!
Do not touch her! Nobody touches her!
[man] Diana Nyad has just swam 110 miles from Cuba!

translation.en: Come towards me.
Right here.
Okay, babe, you got it.

translation.en: Come this way.
Come on, Diana.
Okay, this is all you.

translation.en: [Bonnie] Come on, babe.
You got it. Keep coming. That's right, I'm right here.

translation.en: I'm right here, babe. Keep coming.

translation.en: One more step. We need two ankles out of the water.

translation.en: Two ankles out of the water, you can do it.

translation.en: This is all you, nobody else. Just a couple more feet.

translation.en: One step at a time.
I need two ankles out.
Keep coming, keep coming, I got you.
You're doing great.
Just one first.
You got this. You got this.
Okay, careful, careful.
That's it, that's it. Just two ankles out.
translation.zh: 对 双腿脚踝出水就行

translation.en: -Yeah. -[crowd cheering loudly]
We did it. We did it.
I just want to say three things.
[sniffling] One,
never, ever give up.
Two,
you're never too old to chase your dreams.
translation.zh: 追求梦想 年龄不是问题

translation.en: And three…
it looks like a solitary sport,
but it takes a team.
translation.zh: 但需要一个团队才可能完成

translation.en: That's right.
-Yeah! -[crowd cheering loudly]
We did it!
♪ At the edge I see the end, I see the light ♪
♪ I keep moving faster than I did before ♪
translation.zh: （安吉儿·柳原医生生物化学学者 箱型水母专家） （迪伊·布雷迪 船长）

translation.en: Yeah, we got lucky this time. We had a good Gulf Stream.
translation.zh: 我们很幸运当时的墨西哥湾洋流对我们有利

translation.en: I knew from the beginning Diana was gonna be able to make it to Florida
translation.zh: 我从一开始就知道 如果各方面配合好她就能游到佛罗里达

translation.en: if the right components would just align.
translation.zh: 如果各方面配合好她就能游到佛罗里达

translation.en: [reporter] How do you feel seeing hundreds of supporters here for you?
translation.zh: 看到数以百计的支持者来这里支持你感觉如何？

translation.en: Cool. It was cool.
I saw the look on their faces.
They love to see somebody my age doing something nobody else has ever done.
translation.zh: 他们乐于见到我这样年纪的人做到没人做过的事

translation.en: And the third thing I said on that beach was, "It's a team."
translation.zh: 我在海滩上说的第三件事就是“我们是一个团队”

translation.en: And if you think I'm a badass, you wanna meet Bonnie.
translation.zh: 如果你觉得我厉害 那你得见见邦妮

translation.en: -Bonnie? -She's backstage and she shook my hand.
translation.zh: -邦妮？-她在后台 和我握了手

translation.en: -She's a badass. -Yeah.
Diana tells really great stories, but with her… when I'm involved in 'em,
translation.zh: 戴安娜很会讲故事 但我不喜欢修饰

translation.en: I don't like the little embellishment.
It's not exact--
Just so you know, the big picture is the same,
translation.zh: 反正整体的情况是一样的

translation.en: it never looks exactly like she's saying.
translation.zh: 但她说的从来不完全准确

translation.en: Thank you.
Diana Nyad, I challenged you.
translation.zh: 戴安娜·耐德 我挑战过你

translation.en: You chickened out.
You swam to Cuba with all the sharks and the jellyfish,
translation.zh: 你在鲨鱼和水母的包围下游到古巴

translation.en: but you're afraid to wrestle me?
You came to America in a boat?
I don't wanna be that crazy lady…
…who does this over and over,
fails over and over till I'm 90.
translation.zh: 一次又一次跌倒 直到自己90岁

translation.en: I was swimming with this thing on.
translation.zh: 我游的时候戴着这玩意儿

translation.en: I didn't realize you were wearing this. She's changed since I saw her last.
translation.zh: 我倒不知道你当时戴着这个感觉不一样啊

translation.en: Yeah!
If I sing it 1,000 times,
I've got nine hours and 45 minutes to the, boom, to the beat.
translation.zh: 就等于打9小时45分钟的节拍

translation.en: I'm gonna walk across America.
And I closed my eyes and I closed my fists,
translation.zh: 我闭上双眼 握紧拳头

translation.en: I said it and I meant it.
I couldn't have done it a fingernail faster.
translation.zh: 我当时的速度已经到达极限一点都不可能再快了！

translation.en: You need to just wake up and do it again and again
translation.zh: 得醒过来 一次又一次地去做

translation.en: until you get there.
So at 4:00, it depends on the day, but, like, today was 4:45.
translation.zh: 在4点的时候 要看当天的情况 今天是4点45分

translation.en: I get in my gym.
My neighbors, it's dark.
My neighbors are all soundly asleep, and I play…
translation.zh: 我的邻居们都在熟睡然后我就吹…

translation.en: Which means, "Get up!"
If this is my navigation--
-[Bonnie] That's what we used last year. -[Diana] It's not gonna be like that.
translation.zh: -那是我们去年用的-今年不会这样
